goal.ch:
1.深入理解Python語言： 學生將獲得深入的Python知識，包括進階語法、異常處理、物件導向程式設計等。
2.掌握數據處理工具： 透過Numpy和Pandas，學生將學會如何處理和分析數據，包括數據清理、轉換、聚合等。
3.數據可視化： 學生將使用Matplotlib和Seaborn等工具進行數據可視化，學會如何製作各種圖表來表示數據，從而更好地理解數據和傳達數據洞察。
4.機器學習概念與實作： 引導學生瞭解機器學習的基本原理，包括監督式學習、非監督式學習和深度學習等，並利用Python實作機器學習模型。
5.專題實作與實踐： 鼓勵學生透過期末專題實作，將所學綜合運用到實際問題解決中，從選題、數據收集與處理到結果分析。
goal.en:
In-depth Understanding of Python Language: Students will gain comprehensive knowledge of Python, including advanced syntax, exception handling, and object-oriented programming.

Mastering Data Processing Tools: Using Numpy and Pandas, students will learn how to process and analyze data, including data cleaning, transformation, and aggregation.

Data Visualization: Students will use tools such as Matplotlib and Seaborn to create various charts to represent data, enhancing their ability to understand and communicate data insights.

Machine Learning Concepts and Implementation: Students will be introduced to the fundamental principles of machine learning, including supervised learning, unsupervised learning, and deep learning, and will implement machine learning models using Python.

Project Implementation and Practice: Students are encouraged to apply their knowledge to real-world problem-solving through final projects, encompassing topic selection, data collection and processing, and result analysis.

outline.ch: 本進階Python課程旨在深化學生的程式設計技能，並應用於數據分析、可視化和機器學習領域。課程將從進階Python語法入手，接著學習使用Numpy和Pandas進行數據處理，然後通過Matplotlib和Seaborn實現數據可視化。進一步，學生將探索機器學習的基礎知識，學習建立和評估模型。最後，學生將選擇一個專題，運用所學知識完成從提案到實作的全過程，以此來結合理論與實踐，提升解決實際問題的能力。
outline.en: This advanced Python course aims to deepen students‘ programming skills and apply them to data analysis, visualization, and machine learning. The course will start with advanced Python syntax, followed by learning how to use Numpy and Pandas for data processing, then achieve data visualization through Matplotlib and Seaborn. Furthermore, students will explore the basics of machine learning, learning how to build and evaluate models. Finally, students will choose a project and apply their knowledge to complete the entire process from proposal to implementation, thereby integrating theory with practice and enhancing their ability to solve real-world problems.

textbook.ch:
1. Fluent Python: Clear, Concise, and Effective Programming, by Luciano Ramalho
Publisher ‏ : ‎ O‘Reilly Media; 2nd edition (May 10, 2022)
Language ‏ : ‎ English

gradMethod.ch: 平時成績10％，作業成績30％，期中考30％，期末專題30％
gradMethod.en: Regular performance: 10％, assignment grades: 30％, midterm exam: 30％, final project: 30％

flexDiscription.ch: 最後兩周將安排自主學習、專題、實作等學習活動，最後將進行專題期末報告
flexDiscription.en: During the 17th and 18th weeks, self-directed study, projects, hands-on practice, and other learning activities will be arranged. Finally, a final project presentation will take place.

ch: 系所:限機械工程學系碩士在職專班。
en: Department:MSc(Adult Learning) in Mechanical Engineering only.
